text: Ronald Lee Knecht (born May 5, 1949) is an American attorney, businessman and politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. Knecht ran for State Controller of Nevada in the 2014 election and defeated Democrat Andrew Martin. He lost re-election in 2018 to Democrat Catherine Byrne. He was the only Republican to lose re-election on a statewide office. ==Electoral history== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Nevada lawyers Category:Nevada Republicans Category:Politicians from Carson City, Nevada Category:Politicians from Reno, Nevada Category:Politicians from San Francisco Category:Stanford University alumni Category:State Controllers of Nevada Category:University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign alumni Category:University of San Francisco School of Law alumni
title: Ron Knecht
